snippet: The Shabab Islamist militant group said Tuesday that it was expelling the Save the Children aid agency because it had distributed expired food and tried to bribe Shabab officials.
abstract: Shabab militant group announces that it will expel the Save the Children aid agency from Somalia, alleging that it had distributed expired food and tried to bribe officials; group has kicked out several other aid agencies in recent years.
lead_paragraph: The Shabab Islamist militant group said Tuesday that it was expelling the Save the Children aid agency because it had distributed expired food and tried to bribe Shabab officials.

headline.main: Somalia: Islamist Rebels Vow to Eject Aid Agency
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Islamist Rebels Vow to Eject Aid Agency
